text: Lenin in Poland () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.Главные достижения советского кинематографа на Каннских международных кинофестивалях (1951–1990)ЛЕНИН В ПОЛЬШЕ It stars Maksim Shtraukh, Anna Lisyanskaya, and Antonina Pavlycheva. ==Actors== * Maksim Shtraukh - Vladimir Ilich Lenin * Anna Lisyanskaya - Nadezhda Krupskaya * Antonina Pavlycheva - Krupskaya's Mother * Ilona Kusmierska - Ulka * Edmund Fetting - Honecki * Krzysztof Kalczynski - Andrzej == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:1966 war movies Category:1966 drama movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in Poland Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Lenin in Poland
